title: CAF launches ticketing platform for CAF Women Champions League , Cote dIvoire 2023
body_text:
CAF launches ticketing platform for CAF Women’s Champions League, Cote d’Ivoire 2023
The Confédération Africaine de Football (“CAF”) has launched a ticketing platform for the CAF Women’s Champions League Cote d’Ivoire 2023 in a move to make match tickets accessible for fans across the West African country and beyond.
As part of creating a pleasant and seamless fan experience, the fully functional and user-friendly ticketing system will enable fans to purchase match tickets at their comfort and convenience anywhere and anytime.
Fans will be able to access tickets for the third edition of the CAF Women’s Championship scheduled for 5 -19 November 2023 in the cities of Korhogo and San Pedro via the website,
CAF General Secretary Veron Mosengo-Omba is optimistic the pioneering initiative will be a good test opportunity as Cote d’Ivoire prepares for the TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nations 2023.
In addition, several sale points have been identified in Korhogo and San Pedro where fans can purchase physical tickets with prices as follows:
The CAF Women’s Champions League marks an exciting time for the Ivorian nation as it will afford CAF and the Local Organising Committee the ideal environment to assess its state of readiness ahead of next year’s TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nations.
CAF Communications
